items.title: Awesome Mysql
items.content_text:
### Analysis

*   [Prometheus (⭐59k)](https://github.com/prometheus/prometheus)/[mysqld\_exporter (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/prometheus/mysqld_exporter) - Time series database for real-time monitoring and alerting.

### Benchmarking

*   [iibench-mysql (⭐46)](https://github.com/tmcallaghan/iibench-mysql) - Java based version of the Index Insertion Benchmark for MySQL/Percona/MariaDB.

### Connectors

*   [DBD::MariaDB (⭐35)](https://github.com/perl5-dbi/DBD-MariaDB) - MariaDB and MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
*   [DBD::mysql (⭐64)](https://github.com/perl5-dbi/DBD-mysql) - MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
*   [MariaDB Connector/J (⭐350)](https://github.com/mariadb-corporation/mariadb-connector-j) - LGPL-licensed MariaDB Client Library for Java Applications.
*   [MySQL C API](https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/c-api/) - Official C driver for MySQL.
*   [MySQL Connector/C++ (⭐677)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-cpp) - Official C/C++ driver for MySQL.
*   [MySQL Connector/J (⭐964)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-j) - a standardized database driver for the Java platforms and development.
*   [MySQL Connector/NET (⭐309)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-net) - a standardized database driver for .Net platforms and development.
*   [MySQL Connector/Node.js (⭐158)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-nodejs) - Official Node.js driver for MySQL.
*   [MySQL Connector/Python (⭐913)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-connector-python) - a standardized database driver for Python platforms and development.
*   [mysqlclient-python (⭐2.5k)](https://github.com/PyMySQL/mysqlclient) - MySQL database connector for Python.
*   [PHP mysqlnd](https://www.php.net/manual/en/book.mysqlnd.php) - MySQL native driver for PHP.

### Deployment

*   [dbdeployer (⭐712)](https://github.com/datacharmer/dbdeployer) (archived) - A tool that installs one or more MySQL servers within seconds, easily, securely, and with full control.

### Development

*   [Flywaydb (⭐8.9k)](https://github.com/flyway/flyway) - Database migrations; Evolve your database schema easily and reliably across all your instances
*   [Liquibase (⭐5.1k)](https://github.com/liquibase/liquibase) - Source control for your database
*   [Skeema (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/skeema/skeema) - Declarative pure-SQL schema management system for MySQL and MariaDB, with support for sharding and external online schema change tools
*   [SQLE (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/actiontech/sqle/blob/main/README_en.md) - SQLE is a SQL audit platform for DBA or developer

### GUI

*   [Adminer (⭐6.9k)](https://github.com/vrana/adminer/) - Database management in a single PHP file.
*   [DBeaver (⭐44k)](https://github.com/dbeaver/dbeaver/) - A cross-platform SQL and NoSQL database client.
*   [HeidiSQL (⭐5.3k)](https://github.com/HeidiSQL/HeidiSQL) - MySQL GUI frontend for Windows.
*   [MySQL Shell (⭐206)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-shell/) - Advanced client and code editor for MySQL that supports development and administration for the MySQL Server and MySQL InnoDB cluster (AdminAPI) with an interactive JavaScript, Python, or SQL interface.
*   [MySQL Workbench (⭐950)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-workbench) - provides DBAs and developers an integrated tools environment for database design & modeling; SQL devleopment; database administration.
*   [OmniDB: Web tool for database management (⭐3.2k)](https://github.com/OmniDB/OmniDB)
*   [Percona Monitoring and Management (⭐797)](https://github.com/percona/pmm) - An open-source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL performance.
*   [phpMyAdmin (⭐7.6k)](https://github.com/phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin) - a free software tool written in PHP, intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web.

### HA

*   [Galera Cluster (⭐477)](https://github.com/codership/galera) - a true Multimaster Cluster based on synchronous replication.
*   [Orchestrator (⭐5.7k)](https://github.com/openark/orchestrator) - MySQL replication topology management and High Availability solution.

### Proxy

*   [MySQL Proxy (⭐425)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-proxy) (deprecated) - A simple program that sits between your client and MySQL server(s) that can monitor, analyze or transform their communication.
*   [ProxySQL (⭐6.3k)](https://github.com/sysown/proxysql) - High performance proxy for MySQL.

### Server

*   [Percona Server (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/percona/percona-server) - An enhanced, drop-in MySQL replacement.

### Sharding

*   [Jetpants (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/tumblr/jetpants) - An automation suite for managing large range sharding clusters, by Tumblr.
*   [Vitess (⭐20k)](https://github.com/vitessio/vitess) - vitess provides servers and tools which facilitate scaling of MySQL databases for large scale web services.

### Toolkits

*   [MySQL Utilities (⭐274)](https://github.com/mysql/mysql-utilities) (deprecated) - a collection of command-line utilities, written in Python, that are used for maintaining and administering MySQL servers, either individually, or within Replication hierarchies.
*   [Percona Toolkit (⭐1.3k)](https://github.com/percona/percona-toolkit) - a collection of advanced command-line tools to perform a variety of MySQL server and system tasks that are too difficult or complex to perform manually.
items.content_html:
Analysis

  • Prometheus (⭐59k)/mysqld_exporter (⭐2.3k) - Time series database for real-time monitoring and alerting.

Benchmarking

  • iibench-mysql (⭐46) - Java based version of the Index Insertion Benchmark for MySQL/Percona/MariaDB.

Connectors

  • DBD::MariaDB (⭐35) - MariaDB and MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
  • DBD::mysql (⭐64) - MySQL driver for the Perl5 Database Interface.
  • MariaDB Connector/J (⭐350) - LGPL-licensed MariaDB Client Library for Java Applications.
  • MySQL C API - Official C driver for MySQL.
  • MySQL Connector/C++ (⭐677) - Official C/C++ driver for MySQL.
  • MySQL Connector/J (⭐964) - a standardized database driver for the Java platforms and development.
  • MySQL Connector/NET (⭐309) - a standardized database driver for .Net platforms and development.
  • MySQL Connector/Node.js (⭐158) - Official Node.js driver for MySQL.
  • MySQL Connector/Python (⭐913) - a standardized database driver for Python platforms and development.
  • mysqlclient-python (⭐2.5k) - MySQL database connector for Python.
  • PHP mysqlnd - MySQL native driver for PHP.

Deployment

  • dbdeployer (⭐712) (archived) - A tool that installs one or more MySQL servers within seconds, easily, securely, and with full control.

Development

  • Flywaydb (⭐8.9k) - Database migrations; Evolve your database schema easily and reliably across all your instances
  • Liquibase (⭐5.1k) - Source control for your database
  • Skeema (⭐1.3k) - Declarative pure-SQL schema management system for MySQL and MariaDB, with support for sharding and external online schema change tools
  • SQLE (⭐1.4k) - SQLE is a SQL audit platform for DBA or developer

GUI

  • Adminer (⭐6.9k) - Database management in a single PHP file.
  • DBeaver (⭐44k) - A cross-platform SQL and NoSQL database client.
  • HeidiSQL (⭐5.3k) - MySQL GUI frontend for Windows.
  • MySQL Shell (⭐206) - Advanced client and code editor for MySQL that supports development and administration for the MySQL Server and MySQL InnoDB cluster (AdminAPI) with an interactive JavaScript, Python, or SQL interface.
  • MySQL Workbench (⭐950) - provides DBAs and developers an integrated tools environment for database design & modeling; SQL devleopment; database administration.
  • OmniDB: Web tool for database management (⭐3.2k)
  • Percona Monitoring and Management (⭐797) - An open-source platform for managing and monitoring MySQL performance.
  • phpMyAdmin (⭐7.6k) - a free software tool written in PHP, intended to handle the administration of MySQL over the Web.

HA

  • Galera Cluster (⭐477) - a true Multimaster Cluster based on synchronous replication.
  • Orchestrator (⭐5.7k) - MySQL replication topology management and High Availability solution.

Proxy

  • MySQL Proxy (⭐425) (deprecated) - A simple program that sits between your client and MySQL server(s) that can monitor, analyze or transform their communication.
  • ProxySQL (⭐6.3k) - High performance proxy for MySQL.

Server

  • Percona Server (⭐1.2k) - An enhanced, drop-in MySQL replacement.

Sharding

  • Jetpants (⭐1.1k) - An automation suite for managing large range sharding clusters, by Tumblr.
  • Vitess (⭐20k) - vitess provides servers and tools which facilitate scaling of MySQL databases for large scale web services.

Toolkits

  • MySQL Utilities (⭐274) (deprecated) - a collection of command-line utilities, written in Python, that are used for maintaining and administering MySQL servers, either individually, or within Replication hierarchies.
  • Percona Toolkit (⭐1.3k) - a collection of advanced command-line tools to perform a variety of MySQL server and system tasks that are too difficult or complex to perform manually.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Blogs / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [angular.love](https://angular.love/) - (Polish) Excellent up-to-date resource for Angular.
*   [Tim Deschryver](https://timdeschryver.dev/)
*   [Matthieu Riegler](https://riegler.fr/)

### X / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [Muhammad Ahsan Ayaz](https://x.com/codewith_ahsan)
*   [Dmytro Mezhenskyi](https://x.com/DecodedFrontend)

### YouTube Channels / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [Procademy](https://www.youtube.com/@procademy)
*   [Code Shots With Profanis](https://www.youtube.com/@CodeShotsWithProfanis)

### Integrations / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [NativeScript](https://docs.nativescript.org) - NativeScript provides platform APIs directly to the JavaScript runtime (with strong types) for a rich TypeScript development experience.

### Free / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [zen (⭐208)](https://github.com/ZenSoftware/zen) - Nest + Prisma + Apollo + Angular Full Stack GraphQL Starter Kit.

### Charts / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-echarts (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/xieziyu/ngx-echarts) - Angular directive for [Apache ECharts (⭐64k)](https://github.com/apache/incubator-echarts).

### DOM / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-sharebuttons (⭐536)](https://github.com/MurhafSousli/ngx-sharebuttons) - Angular share buttons.

### File Upload / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [file-upload (⭐88)](https://github.com/pIvan/file-upload) - Angular module used for file upload.

### Keyboard Mouse / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-contextmenu (⭐43)](https://github.com/PerfectMemory/ngx-contextmenu) - A context menu component for Angular.

### Loaders / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [dotglitch-ngx (⭐18)](https://github.com/knackstedt/dotglitch-ngx/tree/main/packages/common/src/components/lazy-loader) - Highly customizable lazy loader for Angular components.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ts-cacheable (⭐343)](https://github.com/angelnikolov/ts-cacheable) - A popular platform-agnostic caching library.

### Additional / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [query (⭐46k)](https://github.com/TanStack/query) - Powerful asynchronous state management, server-state utilities and data fetching for the web.

### Storage / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [ngx-indexed-db (⭐186)](https://github.com/assuncaocharles/ngx-indexed-db) - Wraps IndexedDB in an Angular service.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Domain Specific Language / Imperative DSL Applications

*   [KnitScript: A Domain-Specific Scripting Language for Advanced Machine Knitting](https://dl.acm.org/doi/abs/10.1145/3586183.3606789) - ***UIST'23***, 2023. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?hl=en\&as_sdt=0%2C5\&q=KnitScript%3A+A+Domain-Specific+Scripting+Language+for+Advanced+Machine+Knitting\&btnG=)]. \[[Project](https://pypi.org/project/knit-script/)]. This paper presents KnitScript, a domain-specific machine knitting scripting language that supports computationally driven knitting designs. KnitScript provides a comprehensive virtual model of knitting machines, giving access to machine-level capabilities as they are needed while automating a variety of tedious and error-prone details.
items.content_html:
Domain Specific Language / Imperative DSL Applications

  • KnitScript: A Domain-Specific Scripting Language for Advanced Machine Knitting - UIST'23, 2023. [All Versions]. [Project]. This paper presents KnitScript, a domain-specific machine knitting scripting language that supports computationally driven knitting designs. KnitScript provides a comprehensive virtual model of knitting machines, giving access to machine-level capabilities as they are needed while automating a variety of tedious and error-prone details.

items.title: Awesome Gatling
items.content_text:
### Official Resources

*   [Documentation](https://docs.gatling.io/)

### Distributed Testing

*   [Distributed load testing with Gatling and Kubernetes](https://debijenkorf.tech/https-medium-com-annashepeleva-distributed-load-testing-with-gatling-and-kubernetes-93ebce26edbe)

### Tools / Frameworks

*   [Kraken (⭐117)](https://github.com/OctoPerf/kraken) - Load testing IDE based on Gatling by OctoPerf.

### Trainings & Courses / Miscellaneous

*   [Gatling Academy](https://academy.gatling.io/)

### Videos / Talks

*   [Load Testing Made Easy with Gatling](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8Eplj8BvugA) - Rafał Piotrowski @ Scala Days 2023 Madrid.
